question: Which of the following bank did receive Reserve Bank of India Slaps Rs2-crores Penalty?
explanation: The Reserve Bank of India imposed a monetary penalty of Rs 2 crore on IDFC Bank for contravention of regulatory restrictions pertaining to loans and advances. The penalty has been imposed in the exercise of powers vested in RBI under the Banking Regulation Act, 1949, taking into account failure of the bank to adhere to certain directions issued by RBI.
